mapper.select: SELECT ENTRY_APPL_ID AS entryApplId , APPL_ID AS applId , YMD AS ymd , F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(YMD, 'Y.M.D') AS ymds , CONCAT(IFNULL(F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(PLAN_SDATE,'Y.M.D H:I:S'), ''), ' ~ ', IFNULL(F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(PLAN_EDATE,'Y.M.D H:I:S'), '')) AS planDate , CONCAT(IFNULL(F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(ENTRY_SDATE,'Y.M.D H:I:S'), ''), ' ~ ', IFNULL(F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(ENTRY_EDATE,'Y.M.D H:I:S'), '')) AS entryDate , F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(CHG_SDATE,'Y.M.D H:I:S') AS chgs , F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(CHG_EDATE,'Y.M.D H:I:S') AS chge , F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(PLAN_SDATE,'YMDHIS') AS planSdate , F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(PLAN_EDATE,'YMDHIS') AS planEdate , F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(ENTRY_SDATE,'YMDHIS') AS entrySdate , F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(ENTRY_EDATE,'YMDHIS') AS entryEdate , F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(CHG_SDATE,'YMDHIS') AS chgSdate , F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(CHG_EDATE,'YMDHIS') AS chgEdate , reason FROM WTM_ENTRY_APPL WHERE APPL_ID = #{applId}
